rescuecore2.worldmodel
Class AbstractWorldModel<T extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.worldmodel.AbstractWorldModel<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The subclass of Entity that this world model holds.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>, WorldModel<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultWorldModel
public abstract class AbstractWorldModel<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorldModel<T>

Abstract base class for WorldModel implementations.

merge

public void merge(java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> toMerge)
Description copied from interface: WorldModel
Merge a set of entities into this world. New entities will be added; existing entities will have properties replaced with those taken from the given objects. Any undefined properties in the given objects will NOT cause existing properties to become undefined. Note that this method is not parameterised by T.

Specified by:
merge in interface WorldModel<T extends Entity>
Parameters:
toMerge - The set of entities to merge into this world model.

merge

public void merge(ChangeSet changeSet)
Description copied from interface: WorldModel
Merge a set of changes into this world. If the ChangeSet specifies that a property has become undefined then the existing property WILL become undefined. This behaviour is different to the WorldModel.merge(Collection) method because an undefined value inside a ChangeSet means that the property value has become undefined, whereas in the other version of merge an undefined property means there is no value for that property.

Specified by:
merge in interface WorldModel<T extends Entity>
Parameters:
changeSet - The set of changes to merge into this world model.

fireEntityRemoved

isAllowed

protected boolean isAllowed(Entity e)
Find out if a particular Entity is allowed into this world model. The default implementation checks that the object is assignable to at least one class previously registered with registerAllowedClass(Class).

Parameters:
e - The entity to check.
Returns:
True if the entity is allowed, false otherwise.

registerAllowedClass

protected void registerAllowedClass(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz)
Register an allowed class.

Parameters:
clazz - The subclass of Entity that is allowed in this world model.
